document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">single </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Screw </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Flesh </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">pins </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Soul </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">stands </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">Deity, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">mine, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">side </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Vail </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Once </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">witnessed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">Gauze </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">name </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">put </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">far </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">mine, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">plight </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">printed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">yesterday, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">tender </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">solemn </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">Alphabet, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">eyes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">turned </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">smuggled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">sight </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Into </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">Eternity </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">More </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">Hands </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">hold </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">These </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Two </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">One </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">more </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">new-mailed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Nerve </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">granted, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Peril's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">sake </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">striding </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Giant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">Love </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">greater </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Gods </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">show, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">slink </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">before </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Clay, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">boast </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">let </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">Keepsake </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">go </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A single screw of flesh
